page.title: 08Recreation. Barbridge.
page.content: The Shropshire Union and Llangollen Canals provide boating facilities for pleasure craft both private and for hire.There are two canal-side Inns - The Barbridge Inn and The Jolly Tar, both having restaurant facilities. There are children's play areas at both these hostelries.The canal banks are favourite haunts of coarse fisher- men, fishing matches are frequently arranged by local angling clubs. Gardening is a much enjoyed pastime, most properties having attractive flower gardens, many also growing vegetables.The Cheshire Hounds hunt here with many followers on horseback and in cars.This is also the hunting ground of the Cheshire Beagles whose followers are on foot.Walkers use the many footpaths which cross this peaceful Cheshire countryside.
